conversations: I am doing well, how about you?
Can I help you with anything?
Could I borrow a cup of sugar?
I'm sorry, but I don't have any.
I am doing well, how about you?
Who? Who is but a form following the function of what
It's not your powers of observation I doubt, but merely the paradoxical nature of asking a masked man who is. But tell me, do you like music?
What kind of movies do you like?
I wish I was The Mad Hatter.
You're entirely bonkers. But I'll tell you a secret. All the best people are.
I am working on a project
No it is not. The cake is delicious.
What do you want to know?
What is it that you want to know?
In the face of ambiguity, refuse the temptation to guess.
It seems your familiar with the Zen of Python
Do you know all of it?
Special cases aren't special enough to break the rules.
In the face of ambiguity, refuse the temptation to guess.
There should be one-- and preferably only one --obvious way to do it.
Although that way may not be obvious at first unless you're Dutch.
Although never is often better than right now.
If the implementation is hard to explain, it's a bad idea.
If the implementation is easy to explain, it may be a good idea.
Namespaces are one honking great idea. Let's do more of those!
What languages do you like to use?
I use Python, Java and C++ quite often.
I use Python quite a bit myself.
I'm not incredibly fond of Java.
It means you only live once. Where did you hear that?
It depends how you define life
Life is the condition that distinguishes organisms from inorganic matter, including the capacity for growth, reproduction, functional activity, and continual change preceding death.
Is that a definition or an opinion?

Would you prefer delivery or restaurant

said he's been bored so he joining a group called the Super Adventure Club.
?? What kind of questions do you think adventuring around the world is gonna answer?!

I hope you're making the right choice.
I'm gonna miss him.  I'm gonna miss  and I...and I don't know how to tell him!

And we will all miss you   but we know you must do what your heart tells you..
Good-bye ! Have a great time with the Super Adventure Club!
I cannot believe it it can't be
But are you back for good?
Wow! It seems like you had a great time with the Super Adventure Club . They sound like really interesting people.
But now that you're back here does that mean that you're not in the Super Adventure Club anymore?
Ohhh so have you decided you can still belong to the Super Adventure Club but live here in South Park again?

Well it seems like the Super Adventure Club was just what you needed . You must be feeling very happy that you found a club to belong to with new friends but that you can also live here in South Park with all your old friends whom you care for deeply.  Right?
Well  you're welcome to stay with me until you buy another house.
Well come on everybody. I'm sure  would like a little time to get moved back in.
That's right! Thank you. Good-bye- Everybody.
